content.query:
SELECT
    CONVERT(DATE, created_at, 23) as created_at
    ,COUNT(*) as canceled_subscriptions
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN [plan] LIKE 'Enterprise' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as enterprise_canceled
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN ([plan] LIKE 'Enterprise' AND payment_frequency='Monthly') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as enterprise_canceled_monthly
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN ([plan] LIKE 'Enterprise' AND payment_frequency='Annual') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as enterprise_canceled_annual
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN [plan] LIKE 'Teams' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as teams_canceled
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN ([plan] LIKE 'Teams' AND payment_frequency='Monthly') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as teams_canceled_monthly
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN ([plan] LIKE 'Teams' AND payment_frequency='Annual') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as teams_canceled_annual
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN [plan] LIKE 'Families' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as families_canceled
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN [plan] LIKE 'Other' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as other_canceled
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN ([plan] LIKE 'Premium') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as personal_premium_canceled
FROM [dbo].[subscriptions]
WHERE (status='canceled')
GROUP BY CONVERT(DATE, created_at, 23)
ORDER BY created_at;
